name: Fletcher
description: A craftsman who makes arrows and crossbow bolts; adventurers can purchase ammunition, commission special projectiles, or learn about different arrow types.
atmosphere: The workshop is filled with the rich scent of wood, feathers, and the sharp tang of metal arrowheads. The sound of tools shaping wood and the gentle rustle of feathers creates a methodical, precise atmosphere. The air carries the promise of accuracy and the essential nature of ranged combat.
